posts.content:
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Busfest- ... 8485055817

Ok,our other event 'BusFest Bonaween' is looming around the corner! Situated at our Welland campsite, just around the corner to the BusFest site, on Friday 24th to Sunday 26th October 2014, BusFest Bonaween is our Bonfire night and Halloween night combined themed camping event. For ghoulish fun and spooky tricks and treats, roaring campfire, fireworks, food, drink, music and much more, it's the place to be!
Tickets are strictly limited to about 200 vans, to keep it a small, manageable, intimate affair, and can be booked via the telephone number on the Busfest Bonaween Facebook page, or email
camping@busfest.org for a booking form.
Price for 1 unit , including up to 2 adults, is the same price as last year @ £30. Children under 16 years old go free.
Any questions? Feel free to ask away
Postal Booking DEADline is October 18th.

OK the Deadline has passed.
Anyone wanting to attend this camp can pay at the gate , £35 per unit on the day.
